snippet.title: Best Served Cold - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Can you mix a cocktail while eye-to-eye with a criminal? Find out in Best Served Cold, a murder mystery set in a bustling speakeasy where you serve customers, make friends and enemies, and solve crimes. 

Wishlist now on Steam: https://shorturl.at/jvubB
Follow us on X:  https://x.com/RoguesideGames

Platforms: PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X

Copyright ©2024 Rogueside NV
